data.text: @EU_Commission Volksverräter

@EU_Commission "knight with a blue and yellow shield"

R U F*CKING KIDDNG ME?!
@EU_Commission @EUErasmusPlus @TNavracsicsEU Another fantastic opportunity the UK will miss out on post Brexit!

@EU_Commission That's a yikes. What new labels besides calling your concerned citizens bots, brainwashed kids, Google agents and now a mob will be found to discredit us? Despite other things at least dragon allowed opportunity for peasants to fly. Apparently egotistical knight hates that.
@EU_Commission Medieval laws for modern times....
@EU_Commission Did you but a license to use that link?

@EU_Commission This is a disgraceful piece

Patronising and propagandising. 

It treats citizens with contempt and avoids addressing the substantive criticisms of the copyright directive and portrays a parody of the arguments that have been made instead. Contemptuous

#cuibono #leavernow

@EU_Commission You people are too old and ignorant to be legislating about anything with digital in it. Please step down and let people who know what they're talking about take over. It's disgusting how arrogantly ignorant you are.

@EU_Commission Really? You say #Artikel13 and #artikel11 are good? And that after the shitstorm from yesturday? I cant belive that you all arw proude of destroying the free internet and build a modern censorship like a diktatorship... #nevertrusttheeu #SaveYourInternet
@EU_Commission @loicl In 1973 the uk joined to protect our industry. Later that year we have a coal crisis and the uk is limited to 3 days electric. 👍🇬🇧 sounds like it was a great idea?🙄
@EU_Commission Alright. I’m moving to America.

@EU_Commission "Modern" as in "We had no clue but the content managing companies, not the artists themselves, told us this was necessary. As we are a good dog who listens whenever lobbyism whistles We acted and created the worst possible outcome for EU Citizen. Now we act proud and expect pats"
@EU_Commission Maybe if everyone is screaming "Don't do this" loud enough that you need to write this... maybe don't do it
@EU_Commission FU!
@EU_Commission #Uploadfilter and #LinkTax clearly are not mechanisms fit for the digital age.
@EU_Commission YOU are the disinformation !
@EU_Commission @EUErasmusPlus @TNavracsicsEU il 26 maggio cesserete di esistere

@EU_Commission People stealing content from all over the place to gain followers and then get sponsors/become "popular", meme compilation pages, comment stealers are unhappy. :) I say let's see how this goes.
@EU_Commission More abusive copyright claims for youtubers, yeaaaahhh !

@EU_Commission In times, where EU is threatened by right populists, for me, it seem to be a very dumb idea, to anger the youth and other up to now still loyal #EU citizens. Be prepared, that they will lose their patience too.
@EU_Commission This sucks.

@EU_Commission It makes fair use too dangerous and technically infeasible for all platforms. It's a chilling effect for free expression online. This benefits only large corporations milking every last drop of their commoditized, commercialized "culture". Please drop this terrible legislation!

@EU_Commission Nobody believes your lies, you corporate lap dogs! If this were the truth, I am sure you have no problem describing exactly how platforms will magically distinguish fair use without Uploadfilters. Come on, I'm waiting.

@EU_Commission To preserve my freedom of speech, which is my constitutional right, and to stop censorship for the sake of lining rich people's pockets. Experts, creators and regular people don't support #Article13 and #Article11. If MEPs don't reject these articles, they won't be voted back.

@EU_Commission That article is full of a lot of high ideals and rhetoric, but not a lot of thought about what this will look like in practice. How else would you accomplish this but with extensive filtering and censorship? Please tell us if there is a way because that would solve everything.
@EU_Commission Only A FOOL would agreed w this abomination... this old guy has no idea how internet and artists work...

@EU_Commission European citizens deserve to have their rights protected instead of having them destroyed in a EU sponsored war between GAFAs and Big Content. This directive is a shame, and it damages the rights of creators like journalists.
#SaveYourInternet

@EU_Commission Where is the freedom here?! This law ONLY benefits the big industrias! If you're a small company or just a user on web, you're breaking the law. These articles don't make sense!

You pretend to listen people, but you only think of yourself and your money, you rich ignorants! 😠

@EU_Commission Call it by its name. Censorship tool.

#ACTA2 #StopACTA2 #SaveYourInternet #Article13 #censorship
@EU_Commission If you continue like that you will not only destroy the internet, you will destroy the EU as well. Nothing learned from Brexit! Shame on you!
@EU_Commission @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @NatBruxelles What about the internet censorship you are going to enforce?
@EU_Commission do you have dumb brain? i think you have dumb brain.

@EU_Commission Some #Facts 
=> The directive enforces measures to prevent infringements
=> The only available measure is an upload filter
=> An upload filter can not distinguish between memes, quotes and infringements because it's technically not possible
#CopyrightDirective #SaveTheInternet
@EU_Commission Why are you so eager to weaken the already low reputation the EU has? For me as someone who appreciates the EU and sees is value it is becoming increasingly difficult to defend it.
@EU_Commission Please show me the section of this reform that 'enhances' my rights as an internet user? I couldn't find it myself. I am waiting for your reply. #Article13 #Artikel13 #SaveYourInternet
@EU_Commission Stop lying to the people! They are obviously not as stupid as you would like them to be.

@EU_Commission Modern? We're going back in time. To the time in which companies and TV had the control and citizens didn't have the chance to talk about anything they want with everyone across the world.
@EU_Commission That was what you aimed for. What you delivered is a disfunctional mess that will only benefit huge legacy media and hurt everyone else, including the EU as institution.
@EU_Commission don't be evil - we all know you're lying! #NieMehrCDU @EuropeanCommiss

@EU_Commission If #Article13 is backed it would mean that all social media sites have to implement IMPOSSIBLE upload filters! Algorithms will not be able to distinguish between ‘fair use’ & copyright OUR jobs are at stake. You will not be voted back in if #Article13 is enforced
@EU_Commission Uhm... do you talk about the same #Copyright rules I know about? Because that really doesn't sound familiar.

@EU_Commission If #Article13 is backed it would mean that all social media sites have to implement IMPOSSIBLE upload filters! Algorithms will not be able to distinguish between ‘fair use’ & copyright OUR jobs are at stake. You will not be voted back in if #Article13 is enforced. WAKE UP
@EU_Commission #NieMehrCDU

@EU_Commission And you really wonder why a quickly growing number of people wants to abandon the EU? 
Axel Voss admitted in an interview that he does not know how the enforcement of #ACTA2 will look. And you have the guts to step out here and lie to people’s faces?
@EU_Commission Stop the lies. You royally fucked the internet in a desperate attempt of old men to turn it into another TV.

@EU_Commission This is not modern... this is just wrong and censorship.
#Artikel13 #Article13

@EU_Commission Aha,good joke!Wait,this isn't April 1.
Not funny.
#Article13  won't protect creators nor users,did you even read what the article was about?It will screw all of them over!
So much for the "benefits"!
Please throw #Article13  and 11 in the trash.
@EU_Commission @TNavracsicsEU Az én okom , hogy ti eltűnjetek . És ismerjük úgy működik  , hogy addig csaltok amíg az lesz amit akartok!💣💩🤑
@EU_Commission @Avramopoulos @JKingEU @VeraJourova @EUHomeAffairs @EU_Justice @NatashaBertaud I hope it will be true!
@EU_Commission @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @NatBruxelles @jimkillock Thoughts?

@EU_Commission @EUinmyRegion Elections for a decorative pseudoparliament .Only cause of its existence is to give extremely overpaid jobs to choosed elite members of EU oligarchy and an alibi of (fake)represantation to european citizens
@EU_Commission Dissolution and start from scratch learning from our mistakes.
@EU_Commission #artikel13
@EU_Commission Less conservatives and more pirates please Europe.
@EU_Commission Cannot wait for the EU election and wipe the communism out of brussels! And you may call it populism
@EU_Commission @ProgressiveEur Millions of us in the UK are having our right to vote in these elections taken away from us against our will. Please send help.😳

@EU_Commission 24 hours from this tweet at 8am GMT Saturday 16th February we have only 1000 hours left in EU.  Still hoping for #remain in #hoursleft @ElishaMcC_SF @JohnODowdSF @sinnfeinireland @campaignforleo @BorderIrish @BelfastAgmt

@EU_Commission We need a more #united and #StrongerTogether #EU to become a leader in many of policy areas in the world. Therefore, I will not only vote #ŠoreizEsBalsošu but also I am planning to stand for #EiropasVēlēšanas2019 myself as a #MEP candidate. #vairākEiropas @progresivie
@EU_Commission My reason to vote is to take down the EU from within.
@EU_Commission SEE YOU DESTROYED

@EU_Commission Nein, es ist keine Chance gehört zu werden - Es ist nur die Möglichkeit, den Demagogen Einhalt zu gebieten, die bereits jetzt am Untergang arbeiten. #GierundMachtausnutzung gibt's zuviel bei Euch.
@EU_Commission Luckily I can't vote. But if I could, I would vote for everything that leads to the EU's end.
@EU_Commission My reason to vote is @DiePARTEI

@EU_Commission The British r playing you as they have done 2 many 4 centuries. Mrs May plays good useless cop trying her best with no support. Her party plays bad cop so that you give in 2  Mrs May as the lesser of 2 evils.Please stand firm against their efforts to destroy the EU
@EU_Commission Because together we are stronger in facing global (esp. economic or military or migrational) challenges 😊🇪🇺 #volt #revolt @VoltEuropa
@EU_Commission Because we love 7 course meals and being funded

@EU_Commission Ok but who doesn’t love to live in peace? We might love Erasmus, we travel the world freely, we live all over the world and we all love the planet too. I think Brits look farther, we are not isolationist nor elite.
@EU_Commission Porque nos encanta vivir en un régimen de apartheid que asesina a niños...
@EU_Commission and what will be with all the great #ValentinesDay and all other memes? #Article13 will fuck all that great stuff

@EU_Commission Fuck you... You are destroying the internet. And this is no "fake news". I hope there is a "special place in hell" for the people who created #Article11 and #Article13. This is reality... @Google is on the right side this time... Imagine!!
@EU_Commission We need entertainment too. Eg Netflix Austia has a FRACTION of what US Netflix has!

@EU_Commission @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @NatBruxelles Modern copyright has an excemption to remixes, allowes no regionality in copyright so we can access ALL us content on Netflix, we CAN get Hulu. You guys live in the 1990ies and that is where your law came from.
#SaveYourInternet
@EU_Commission Did you license that photo?!
@EU_Commission No words really

@EU_Commission Nice try at damage control. 

About the title of your article. Save the Dragon, slay the Knight? The Dragon is the Monster we know, fairly quiet as well, once a decade. The Knight might as well turn out the be a blood sucking vampire that'll wreck more, and continous havoc.
@EU_Commission and so the eu breaks, brexit for all, thats not anymore my eu i vote 4.
@EU_Commission European unity is the pathway tocontinuipeace.

@EU_Commission Disagree with Alibaba completely. There is ofcpurse some readjustment asstamdards of living even our Europe,  but please don't I sister that keep some people poor by paying them lower wages is morally right.

@EU_Commission backs medical marijuana

Cc: @TheWellbeingI @WHO @DrAxelrod_WHO @KulikovUNIATF @ncdalliance @un_ncd @smilebuildersng @toyyibdimeji @NCDCgov @larexy84
@EU_Commission 💖💖💖
@EU_Commission #LoveEu
@EU_Commission I think you will find NATO is the reason you live in peace...

@EU_Commission I'm afraid the #EU is letting the Catalan people down by looking away while human rights and civil liberties are being crushed in Catalonia by a corrupt and increasingly totalitarian Spanish state with the help of the far-right and the jingoistic Spanish media #ThisIsTheRealSpain
@EU_Commission Nope, not enough. Try again..#brexit
@EU_Commission You are the evil seed that survived the fall of Nazi Germany.  You are anti-democratic Facists who oppress millions of people
@EU_Commission Peace in Europe was won by the British Empire, the Soviet Union & the United States fighting European fascism - which is you.
@EU_Commission Im sure political-prisoners in #Catalonia don’t feel the #Eu 💛🎗

@EU_Commission @aor_4 Maybe you should write an article actually explaining what the #copyrightdirective is about, and counterargumenting with facts, instead of just saying "they lie, don't listen to them".
@EU_Commission Please fight harder.

@EU_Commission With all due respect we are the ones who know the systems, know the capabilities & failure rate. We also know how legislation defines commercial and how it will, in fact be everything you deny and more. Please get informed on the fallout -do your job for the people, not lobbyists

@EU_Commission No, Europeans will have Draconian measures that were outdated decades ago and will destroy digital Europe, because these rules are entirely impossible to implement and many companies will have no choice but to block EU users entirely for fear of being fined.
@EU_Commission 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😃😃😃🤡🤡🤡
